LanguageData.IAmPregnant.stages.0.label: Pregnant
LanguageData.IAmPregnant.stages.0.description: I'm going to have a baby!
LanguageData.PartnerIsPregnant.stages.0.label: Partner is pregnant
LanguageData.PartnerIsPregnant.stages.0.description: We're going to have a baby!
LanguageData.WeGotPregnant.stages.0.label: we're pregnant
LanguageData.WeHadBabies.stages.0.label: had children together
LanguageData.PostPartumDepression.stages.0.label: post partum depression
LanguageData.PostPartumDepression.stages.0.descriptio: Shouldn't I feel happy about having a child...? I just feel overwhelmed. I don't think I can do this.
LanguageData.PostPartumDepression.stages.1.label: post partum depression
LanguageData.PostPartumDepression.stages.1.descriptio: I can't take care of a child; I can't even take care of myself. I'm a horrible mother.
LanguageData.BabyStillborn.stages.0.label: my baby was stillborn
LanguageData.IGaveBirthFirstTime.stages.0.label: new mother
LanguageData.IGaveBirthFirstTime.stages.0.description: I've brought a child into the world; I'm a mother now!
LanguageData.IGaveBirth.stages.0.label: gave birth
LanguageData.IGaveBirth.stages.0.description: I've brought another child into the world!
LanguageData.PartnerGaveBirth.stages.0.label: new child
LanguageData.LateTermAbortion.stages.0.label: late term abortion
LanguageData.LateTermAbortion.stages.0.description: My fetus was aborted. It looked just like a little baby, but so still and quiet.
LanguageData.LateTermAbortion.stages.1.label: my baby was aborted
LanguageData.LateTermAbortion.stages.1.description: My baby was aborted just before it could be born. Seeing it lying there motionless- there's a horrible pain in my heart that won't go away.
LanguageData.MyChildGrowing.stages.0.label: my child is growing up
LanguageData.MyChildGrowing.stages.0.description: How amazing it is that children grow up in the blink of an eye!
